The Solution: Unified AI Knowledge Platform

What We're Building

An AI-Integrated Enterprise Knowledge Base that serves as the unified knowledge layer for both AI agents and employees.

Consolidates fragmented knowledge tools into a single, intelligent platform powered by RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architecture.

Enables real-time, accurate knowledge retrieval with hybrid search (vector + keyword) and intelligent context building.

Deployment Strategy

Alibaba Cloud (China Region)

  • Primary cloud infrastructure
  • Qwen LLMs via Model Studio
  • AnalyticDB-PG for vectors
  • Data residency compliance

Microsoft Integration (Retained)

  • Azure AD for SSO/Identity
  • Microsoft 365 for Office
  • MS Graph API connectors
